result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody D Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Receiving or Concealing Stolen Property (<=$2500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.34(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Subject to good time and work release

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid thru Probation. Failure to pay will be a judgment.
$1352.25 Restitution to Rockland Stop & Go, J&S with John Werlein.  May be reduced to civil judgment as long as have made good faith effort toward payment.
$200.00 DNA surcharge to be paid thru Probation.  Failure to pay will be a judgment.
Not to have contact with: Rockland Stop & Go

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant Cody D Smith in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Defendant Cody D Smith in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 10:24 am.

May be reduced to judgment as long as made good faith effort toward payment.  Must report to probation.  PCR.  10:45 am adj.
